advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Wisdom™ is a free Facebook app that acts like your personal polling and recommendation service, providing interesting insights into your social network and beyond. Want to know what music is most popular with young, single people? What movies are most popular with guys under 35 years old? What type of people like a particular TV show? Or, for that matter, who amongst your friends is the most popular? You’ve come to right app – Wisdom.
 
Feature list:
·         My News: Provides a quick and easy way to access the stories important to you by giving more control of what you see – What are the most popular posts this week? Who’s going on vacation? Who’s moving? Who’s getting engaged? Wisdom provides you with the ability to quickly view stuff that matters to you. “Chatter” will make sure that you’re always in the loop. What did Johnny write on Susie’s wall? Wisdom makes it easy for you to always stay in-the-know by constantly scanning your friends’ walls for posts from others and bringing it all together in a single stream.
·         Hot Spots: Visiting a new city and need a restaurant recommendation? Access this unique way of locating the hottest bars, restaurants, and clubs, based on your preferences. Let Wisdom recommend fun places and activities, no matter where you are.
·         Entertainment: Get the coolest recommendations from Wisdom on the most popular music, movies, TV shows, and sports. What other bands are most popular with people who like Radiohead? What other TV shows are popular with people who like The Wire?
·         Infographics: Personalize and share fun infographics with your friends. What gifts should you get your favorite cousin? What books are moms into these days? Get the latest and greatest stats on big sporting or entertainment events. Also view the “My Network Analysis” infographic to find everything about your friends, and share your insights for fun.
·         Facebook Pages Analysis: Use the world’s largest focus group, Facebook, to discover your friends’ preferences based on their actual ‘Likes’ and sit behind the controls of one of the most powerful recommendation engines ever built.
 
How does it work?
Wisdom works when you provide access to your basic information on Facebook. This anonymized information is then used to generate interesting, insightful, and fun information for you. The Wisdom Network currently boasts millions of users that contribute to the app. The more Wisdom is used by people, the smarter the app gets. So tell your friends to download Wisdom today, and collectively gain access to the most powerful crowd-sourced network.
 
Please note that we take utmost care about your privacy—the information that you share with the app is never exposed in personally identifiable form to Wisdom users other than your Facebook friends who have also installed the app, nor is it provided in personally identifiable form to any third parties for their use in marketing their products or services to you.
 
Note: Upon installing the app for the first time, some personal network features that require significant processing may take up to 24 hours to be available.
 
Learn more about Wisdom features and our data privacy policies at www.wisdom.com.
 
What's new in this version:
·         Various user experience enhancements including new features such as Hot Spots, Entertainment, Infographics, and Facebook Pages.
·         Enhancements for iOS 6 support.
releaseNotes:
What’s new in this version: 
· Enhanced compatibility with iOS 7
· Updated Facebook authentication to use the newer Facebook SDK and iOS/Facebook application integration. 
· Enhanced iPhone 5 support. 

Additional fixes: 
· Fixed login failure for brand new users. 
· Fixed session timing out during login. 
· Enhanced login performance.
· Updated Facebook permissions.
